price: 35.Kaadu usuk kay kataysa moomintuk gaba xabba heeh isi bustaan luk kaa cule isi bustaan lenna kaa yayballuh usuk isi nafsi yudlume numuh anuk koroosannuu kee kaxxa mariinot, a-bustaan inkinnah gaba kalu waam makkala kaak iyye.
arabic: وَدَخَلَ جَنَّتَهُۥ وَهُوَ ظَالِمٞ لِّنَفۡسِهِۦ قَالَ مَآ أَظُنُّ أَن تَبِيدَ هَٰذِهِۦٓ أَبَدٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wadakhala jannatahu wahuwa ẓālimun linafsihi qāla mā aẓunnu an tabīda hādhihi abadan
